trans-unit.target: 網頁開發人員可以提供的自訂處理常式相關聯的事件加`OnWebPartClosinging`屬性`<asp:webpartmanager>`等網頁，然後將自訂的方法名稱指派給屬性的項目。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCancelEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCancelEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleted"></xref> event, which occurs after a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control has been permanently deleted from a page.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleted"></xref>事件之後，就會發生<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控制項永久刪除從頁面。

trans-unit.source: The OnWebPartDeleted method is called during the process of deleting a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control (or other server control that is added to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone) from a page.
trans-unit.target: 刪除的程序期間會呼叫 OnWebPartDeleted 方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項 (或加入至其他伺服器控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>區域) 頁面。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can create a custom handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleted> event by adding the `OnWebPartDeleted` attribute to the <`asp:webpartmanager>` element, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 網頁開發人員可以建立的自訂處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleted>事件加`OnWebPartDeleted`屬性`asp:webpartmanager>`項目，並將自訂的方法名稱指派給屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleted>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting"></xref> event, which indicates that a dynamic <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control (or server or user control that is contained in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> zone) is in the process of being deleted.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting"></xref>事件，這表示動態<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控制項 (或包含在伺服器或使用者控制項<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref>區域) 正在刪除。

trans-unit.source: Only dynamic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls can be deleted, and when a control is deleted, the control instance is permanently removed from a page and cannot be restored.
trans-unit.target: 只有動態<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項可以被刪除，並刪除控制項時，控制項執行個體從頁面時，會永久移除，且無法還原。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Dynamic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls are those that are added programmatically, or from a Web Parts catalog, as opposed to static controls that are declared in the markup of a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 動態<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項是以程式設計的方式，加入或從 Web 組件類別目錄中，而不是靜態控制項中宣告的 Web 網頁的標記。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The OnWebPartDeleting method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting> event to indicate that a control is being permanently deleted from its zone.
trans-unit.target: OnWebPartDeleting 方法就會引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting>表示控制項會永久刪除從其區域事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleting>

trans-unit.source: The method also provides the opportunity to cancel the deleting process.
trans-unit.target: 此方法也會提供取消刪除的程序的機會。

trans-unit.source: If the control is successfully deleted from the page, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleted> event follows.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項已成功刪除頁面上，從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleted>事件會依循。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleted>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can provide a custom handler for the associated event by adding the `OnWebPartDeleting` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element on a Web page, and then assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 網頁開發人員可以提供的自訂處理常式相關聯的事件加`OnWebPartDeleting`屬性`<asp:webpartmanager>`等網頁，然後將自訂的方法名稱指派給屬性的項目。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCancelEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCancelEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved"></xref> event, which occurs after a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control has been moved to a different location on a page.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved"></xref>事件之後，就會發生<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>網頁上控制項移至不同的位置。

trans-unit.source: The OnWebPartMoved method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved> event at the very end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.MoveWebPart%2A> method, which ensures that the process of moving a control is complete before any code in the event handler runs.
trans-unit.target: OnWebPartMoved 方法就會引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved>事件的結尾處<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.MoveWebPart%2A>方法，可確保移動控制項的處理程序會完成之前的任何程式碼在事件處理常式的執行,。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.MoveWebPart%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved> event is raised when a control is moved within its current zone, or to another zone, and it does not matter whether the movement is done programmatically or by a user dragging the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved>控制項移其目前的區域中，或另一個區域，而不論是否移動是以程式設計方式或由使用者拖曳控制項時引發事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can create a custom handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved> event by adding the `OnWebPartMoved` attribute to the <`asp:webpartmanager>` element, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 網頁開發人員可以建立的自訂處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved>事件加`OnWebPartMoved`屬性`asp:webpartmanager>`項目，並將自訂的方法名稱指派給屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving"></xref> event, which indicates that a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or server or user control in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> zone is in the process of being moved.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving"></xref>事件，這表示<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>或中的伺服器或使用者控制項<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref>區域正在移動。

trans-unit.source: The OnWebPartMoving method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving> event, which occurs when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server control is being moved within its zone or to another zone.
trans-unit.target: OnWebPartMoving 方法就會引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving>事件發生時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或其他伺服器控制項正在移動其區域內，或另一個區域。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoving>

trans-unit.source: The method also provides the opportunity to cancel the moving process.
trans-unit.target: 此方法也會提供取消移動程序的機會。

trans-unit.source: If the move is successfully completed, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved> event follows.
trans-unit.target: 如果順利完成移動，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved>事件會依循。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can provide a custom handler for the associated event by adding the `OnWebPartMoving` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element on a Web page, and then assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 網頁開發人員可以提供的自訂處理常式相關聯的事件加`OnWebPartMoving`屬性`<asp:webpartmanager>`等網頁，然後將自訂的方法名稱指派給屬性的項目。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMovingEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMovingEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected"></xref> event, which occurs after a connection has been established between <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected"></xref>之間建立連接之後，就會發生的事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The OnWebPartsConnected method raises its corresponding event at the very end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A> method, which ensures that the steps necessary to connect two controls are completed before any code in the event handler runs.
trans-unit.target: OnWebPartsConnected 方法就會引發對應的事件的結尾處<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A>方法，可確保連接兩個控制項所需的步驟都完成之後，事件處理常式中的任何程式碼執行之前。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A>

trans-unit.source: The method provides programmatic control over the process of creating connections, and the associated event is a convenient point at which to update the user interface (UI) or notify a user that a connection has been established.
trans-unit.target: 此方法會提供以程式設計方式控制建立連接的程序和相關聯的事件是一個方便的點要更新的使用者介面 (UI)，或告知使用者已建立連線。

trans-unit.source: Page developers can create a custom handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> event by adding the `OnWebPartsConnected` attribute to the <`asp:webpartmanager>` element, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 網頁開發人員可以建立的自訂處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected>事件加`OnWebPartsConnected`屬性`asp:webpartmanager>`項目，並將自訂的方法名稱指派給屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting"></xref> event, which occurs during the process of establishing a connection between two <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or server or user controls contained in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> zone.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting"></xref>建立兩個連接的程序期間發生的事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>或所包含的伺服器或使用者控制項<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref>區域。

trans-unit.source: The OnWebPartsConnecting method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting> event, which occurs when two controls attempt to establish a connection.
trans-unit.target: OnWebPartsConnecting 方法就會引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting>事件，當兩個控制項嘗試建立連接時，就會發生此事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnecting>

trans-unit.source: The method provides the opportunity to cancel the connection attempt.
trans-unit.target: 此方法提供有機會取消正在嘗試連接。

trans-unit.source: If the connection is successful, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> event follows.
trans-unit.target: 如果連接成功，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected>事件會依循。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can provide a custom handler for the associated event by adding the `OnWebPartsConnecting` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element on a Web page, and then assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 網頁開發人員可以提供的自訂處理常式相關聯的事件加`OnWebPartsConnecting`屬性`<asp:webpartmanager>`等網頁，然後將自訂的方法名稱指派給屬性的項目。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsCancelEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsCancelEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected"></xref> event, which occurs after a connection between <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls has ended.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected"></xref>事件之間的連線之後，就會發生<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控制項已結束。

trans-unit.source: The OnWebPartsDisconnected method raises its corresponding event at the very end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A> method, which carries out the process of terminating a connection between two controls.
trans-unit.target: OnWebPartsDisconnected 方法就會引發對應的事件的結尾處<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A>方法，執行 結束連接兩個控制項的處理。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A>

trans-unit.source: The method provides programmatic control over the process of ending a connection, so that developers can inform the user, make changes to the user interface (UI), or make other changes to the application.
trans-unit.target: 此方法提供結束連接的程序以程式設計方式控制，讓開發人員可以通知使用者，變更使用者介面 (UI)，或對應用程式進行其他變更。

trans-unit.source: Page developers can create a custom handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> event by adding the `OnWebPartsDisconnected` attribute to the <`asp:webpartmanager>` element, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 網頁開發人員可以建立的自訂處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected>事件加`OnWebPartsDisconnected`屬性`asp:webpartmanager>`項目，並將自訂的方法名稱指派給屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting"></xref> event, which indicates that two <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or server or user controls in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> zone are in the process of ending a connection.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting"></xref>事件，表示有兩個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>或中的伺服器或使用者控制項<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref>區域的結束連接的程序。

trans-unit.source: The OnWebPartsDisconnecting method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> event, which occurs when two controls are ending a connection.
trans-unit.target: OnWebPartsDisconnecting 方法就會引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting>事件，這兩個控制項都結束連接時，就會發生。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting>

trans-unit.source: The method provides the opportunity to cancel the disconnection process.
trans-unit.target: 此方法會提供取消中斷連線程序的機會。

trans-unit.source: If the connection is successfully removed, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> event follows.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功移除連接，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected>事件會依循。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can provide a custom handler for the associated event by adding the `OnWebPartsDisconnecting` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element on a Web page, and then assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 網頁開發人員可以提供的自訂處理常式相關聯的事件加`OnWebPartsDisconnecting`屬性`<asp:webpartmanager>`等網頁，然後將自訂的方法名稱指派給屬性的項目。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsCancelEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsCancelEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to an object that contains personalization data for a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件，包含網頁的個人化資料的參考。

trans-unit.source: The Personalization property provides a way to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> object that is associated with a page through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 個人化屬性可用來存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>逐頁檢視相關聯的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>

trans-unit.source: Using this property, you can access the various members of the personalization object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性，存取個人化物件的各種不同的成員。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A> method to switch the page's personalization scope from shared to user scope, or vice versa.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A>方法切換網頁的個人化範圍從共用的使用者領域，反之亦然。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also find out the current personalization scope of the page, whether personalization is even enabled on the page, which provider is being used for the personalization data, and more.
trans-unit.target: 是否在哪一個提供者用於個人化資料，以及其他的頁面上，甚至啟用個人化，您也可以找出目前個人化範圍的頁面。

trans-unit.source: Note that the data referenced by the Personalization property is only the page-level personalization data that is tracked by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，個人化屬性所參考的資料只會追蹤的頁面層級個人化資料<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Control-specific personalization data, such as the values of personalizable properties on <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, is not part of the Personalization property.
trans-unit.target: 控制項特定個人化資料，例如可個人化屬性的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制，不是個人化屬性的一部分。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > For more information on Web Parts personalization, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 多個 Web 組件個人化的詳細資訊，請參閱[Web 組件個人化概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"></xref> that contains personalization data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization"> </xref>包含個人化資料。

trans-unit.source: Enables the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control to emit client-side script that is used for various personalization features, such as dragging <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 可讓<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>發出用戶端指令碼用於不同的個人化功能，例如拖曳控制項<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>在網頁中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Overridden to prevent the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control from rendering any content.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免覆寫<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>呈現任何內容的控制項。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that receives the content of the control to write to the page.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> ，接收控制項內容的寫入頁面。

trans-unit.source: Saves state data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control so the data can be restored on future request to the Web page that contains the control.
trans-unit.target: 儲存狀態資料<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>控制，因此可以在未來的要求，包含控制項的網頁上還原資料。

trans-unit.source: The SaveControlState method saves state data for properties that should be persisted across page postbacks, even when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 方法會將儲存狀態資料的屬性應保存在頁面回傳 SaveControlState 即使<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>屬性設定為`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> to contain the control's saved state data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>包含控制項的儲存狀態資料。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Saves custom personalization state data maintained by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control, so that this data can be reloaded whenever the page is reloaded.
trans-unit.target: 儲存自訂的個人化狀態資料所維護<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>控制，以便可以重新載入此資料，只要重新載入頁面。

trans-unit.source: The SaveCustomPersonalizationState method is critical in the process of personalization, because it enables personalized user settings to be stored for future browser sessions and visits to a page.
trans-unit.target: SaveCustomPersonalizationState 方法很重要進行個人化的因為它可讓個人化的使用者設定儲存為未來的瀏覽器工作階段，並瀏覽至頁面。

trans-unit.source: The method saves custom personalization state data, which includes items such as the following: dynamic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or server controls that have been added to a page or deleted from a page; controls that have been moved on a page; and dynamic connections that have been created or deleted.
trans-unit.target: 方法會將儲存自訂的個人化狀態資料，其中包含項目，如下所示︰ 動態<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或伺服器控制項的頁面加入或刪除頁面; 已移動頁面的控制項和動態的連接，建立或刪除。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: You cannot call this method directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 您無法直接從您的程式碼呼叫此方法。

trans-unit.source: You can, however, call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.System%23Web%23UI%23WebControls%23WebParts%23IPersonalizable%23Save%2A> method, which itself calls this method to save personalization data.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.System%23Web%23UI%23WebControls%23WebParts%23IPersonalizable%23Save%2A>方法，而其本身呼叫此方法來儲存個人化資料。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.System%23Web%23UI%23WebControls%23WebParts%23IPersonalizable%23Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary"></xref> that contains the state data to be loaded.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary"> </xref> ，其中包含要載入的狀態資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or other server control that is currently selected for editing or for creating a connection with another control.
trans-unit.target: 取得參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>或目前未選取進行編輯或建立連接與另一個控制項的其他伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: The SelectedWebPart property returns a reference to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server control that is currently selected for editing or for creating a connection with another control.
trans-unit.target: SelectedWebPart 屬性傳回的參考<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或目前未選取進行編輯或建立連接與另一個控制項的其他伺服器控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control provides several useful methods and events for handling the process of selecting a control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項提供數種有用的方法和事件的處理程序的選取控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging> event occurs just after a control is selected, but before any changes are made.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging>只選取控制項之後，但進行任何變更之前，就會發生事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanging>

trans-unit.source: To carry out some actions on the control after it is selected, override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnSelectedWebPartChanging%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行某些控制項上的動作之後加以選取，請覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnSelectedWebPartChanging%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnSelectedWebPartChanging%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to change the appearance of a control that is selected but has not changed yet, to emphasize visually which control is selected.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，您可能想要變更的控制項選取但未變更，以視覺化方式強調選取的控制項的外觀。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanged> event occurs just after the selected control has been changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanged>之後已變更選取的控制項，就會發生事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanged>

trans-unit.source: To carry out some actions on the control after it has changed, override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnSelectedWebPartChanged%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更後執行某些控制項上的動作，請覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnSelectedWebPartChanged%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnSelectedWebPartChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control that is currently selected for editing or forming a connection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref>編輯或建立連接的目前選取的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the selection of one <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control has changed and moved to another control on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個選取範圍之後，就會發生<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控制項已變更，並移至另一個網頁上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: This event can be used in conjunction with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnSelectedWebPartChanged%2A> method to change the user interface (UI) of a selected control.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可用於搭配<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnSelectedWebPartChanged%2A>方法，以變更選取的控制項的使用者介面 (UI)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnSelectedWebPartChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the user switches the page to design mode (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>), and then selects a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control with the intent of dragging it to a new position, it is common to change the rendering of the selected control, for example by changing the color of its border or background while it is selected.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果使用者切換到設計模式的頁面 (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>)，然後選取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項目的，是將它拖曳到新位置，通常會藉由變更框線的色彩，例如變更的呈現方式選取的控制項，或背景時選取它。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > For more information on consuming events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 上取用事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to︰ 使用 Web Form 應用程式中的事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs during the process of changing which <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or server control is currently selected on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 變更其中的程序期間發生<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>或伺服器控制項目前選取網頁上。

trans-unit.source: This event can be used in conjunction with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnSelectedWebPartChanging%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可用於搭配<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnSelectedWebPartChanging%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnSelectedWebPartChanging%2A>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can create an event handler in their code by adding the `OnSelectedWebPartChanging` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element in a page, and setting the value of the attribute to the name of a custom method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 網頁開發人員可以建立程式碼中的事件處理常式加`OnSelectedWebPartChanging`屬性`<asp:webpartmanager>` 頁面上，並將屬性的值設定為自訂的方法名稱中的項目即將處理此事件。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised during the process of beginning or ending a connection between controls, and when beginning and ending an edit of a control.
trans-unit.target: 開始或結束連接控制項之間，以及當開始和結束的編輯控制項的程序期間，會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: For details, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnSelectedWebPartChanging%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnSelectedWebPartChanging%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnSelectedWebPartChanging%2A>

trans-unit.source: Normally, when the SelectedWebPartChanging event is raised as a direct result of a user's action that changes the selected control, the event can be cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 一般來說，SelectedWebPartChanging 事件引發時的直接結果的變更所選的控制項的使用者動作，可以取消事件。

trans-unit.source: However, there is a scenario in which the event cannot be cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 不過，是無法取消事件中的案例。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control is deleted, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls it contains must all be closed, otherwise they would be orphaned.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>就在刪除控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>它所包含的控制項必須全部關閉，否則它們會被遺棄。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>

trans-unit.source: In this case the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control closes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, not the user, and it must determine which control is currently selected and when to change the selection without any chance of interruption, so that it can complete the process of cleaning up all the controls.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制關閉<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項、 不使用者，而且它必須決定目前選取的控制項，以及何時變更選取範圍沒有任何中斷的機會，讓它能完成清除所有控制項的程序。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, by design the SelectedWebPartChanging method cannot be cancelled in this scenario.
trans-unit.target: 因此，根據設計 SelectedWebPartChanging 方法無法在此案例中取消。

trans-unit.source: For a related event that can be cancelled, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing> event.
trans-unit.target: 相關事件可取消，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosing>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Sets a flag indicating that custom personalization data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control has changed.
trans-unit.target: 設定旗標，表示該自訂個人化資料，以<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>控制項已變更。

trans-unit.source: The SetPersonalizationDirty method sets a flag that ultimately causes the personalization components in the Web Parts control set to save the updated personalization data.
trans-unit.target: SetPersonalizationDirty 方法設定旗標，最終導致 Web 組件控制項設定為將更新的個人化資料儲存中的 個人化元件。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the scenarios that can cause changes to the personalization data tracked by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.System%23Web%23UI%23WebControls%23WebParts%23IPersonalizable%23IsDirty%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，可能會導致個人化資料所追蹤的變更之案例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.System%23Web%23UI%23WebControls%23WebParts%23IPersonalizable%23IsDirty%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.System%23Web%23UI%23WebControls%23WebParts%23IPersonalizable%23IsDirty%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The SetPersonalizationDirty method cannot be called directly from your code, and cannot be overridden, because it is used internally by the Web Parts control set as part of the Web Parts personalization feature.
trans-unit.target: SetPersonalizationDirty 方法無法直接從您的程式碼呼叫，並無法覆寫，因為它供內部 Web 組件控制項設定為 Web 組件個人化功能的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart*> property value equal to the currently selected <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or server control.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart*>等於目前選取的屬性值<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>或伺服器控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart*>

trans-unit.source: The SetSelectedWebPart method is called during the processes that begin or end editing of the control specified by the `webPart` parameter, and those that begin or end a connection that includes `webPart`.
trans-unit.target: 開始或結束編輯所指定之控制項的處理程序期間會呼叫 SetSelectedWebPart 方法`webPart`參數，且開頭或結尾包含連線的`webPart`。

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of the edit and connection processes, `webPart` is the control that has been selected to be edited or to enter a connection.
trans-unit.target: 編輯和連接處理程序的開頭`webPart`是已選取要編輯，或輸入連接的控制。

trans-unit.source: At the end of the edit and connection processes, `null` is passed to the SetSelectedWebPart method, which results in the currently selected control no longer being selected.
trans-unit.target: 編輯和連接處理程序的結尾`null`傳遞給 SetSelectedWebPart 方法，會導致取消選取目前選取的控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or server control that has been selected.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref>或已選取的伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an empty string ("") so that no skin can be applied to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定為空字串 ("")，因此沒有面板可以套用至<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The SkinID property overrides the inherited <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to prevent the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control, which is an invisible control, from using skins.
trans-unit.target: SkinID 屬性會覆寫繼承<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性可防止<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項，這是不可見的控制項，從使用面板。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The implementation of the property prevents a skin from being assigned by always returning an empty string from the `get` accessor, and always throwing an exception if there is an attempt to set a value in the `set` accessor.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的實作可防止面板指派由一律會傳回空字串從`get`存取子，並一律在嘗試設定中的值是否擲回例外狀況`set`存取子。

trans-unit.source: An empty string that prevents the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control from having a skin assigned to it.
trans-unit.target: 空字串，可防止<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>毋需指派給它的外觀的控制項。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the property value.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試設定屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the collection of all <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> objects on a Web page that are defined as static connections.
trans-unit.target: 取得所有集合的參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref>網頁上會定義為靜態連接的物件。

trans-unit.source: The StaticConnections property is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control to track and manage all static connections on a page.
trans-unit.target: StaticConnections 屬性供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項來追蹤和管理頁面上的所有靜態連接。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: A static connection, in contrast with a dynamic connection, does not need to be added to a page every time the page is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 靜態連接，相較於動態的連接，不必每次在呈現的頁面加入至網頁。

trans-unit.source: The collection referenced by this property contains all the static connections that exist on the page, whether they are created programmatically or specified with an `<asp:webpartconnection>` element in the page's markup.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性所參考的集合包含所有存在的頁面，是否會在建立以程式設計方式或使用指定的靜態連接`<asp:webpartconnection>`在網頁標記中的項目。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection"></xref> that contains all the static connections on the page.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection"> </xref>包含頁面上的所有靜態連接。

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only collection of all display modes that are available on a particular Web page.
trans-unit.target: 取得所有在特定的 Web 網頁可用的顯示模式的唯讀集合。

trans-unit.source: The SupportedDisplayModes property contains only the display modes that are actually available on a page, given the kinds of zone controls present on the page.
trans-unit.target: SupportedDisplayModes 屬性包含僅會在頁面上，指定區域在頁面上出現的控制項種類實際可用的顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Display modes can be disabled, and when a display mode is disabled, it is not added to the SupportedDisplayModes collection, even when the corresponding type of zone that supports that display mode is present on the page.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 顯示模式可以停用，而且停用的顯示模式時，不加入至 SupportedDisplayModes 集合中，即使對應支援顯示模式的區域類型存在於頁面上。

trans-unit.source: Browse mode and design mode are always supported.
trans-unit.target: 一律支援瀏覽模式和設計模式。

trans-unit.source: The display modes that can vary are the edit, catalog, and connect modes.
trans-unit.target: 可以改變的顯示模式是編輯、 目錄和連接模式。

trans-unit.source: Each of these display modes is associated with a particular type of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> control.
trans-unit.target: 每一種顯示模式都與特定類型的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>

trans-unit.source: It is the presence of that specially typed zone on a Web page that causes a particular display mode to be added to the collection referenced by the SupportedDisplayModes property.
trans-unit.target: 它是特別具型別的區域 SupportedDisplayModes 屬性所參考的集合會以特定顯示模式會導致在網頁上存在。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a Web page contains an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> zone but not a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> zone, then the edit display mode is one of the supported modes on that page, but the catalog display mode is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果網頁包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>而非區域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>區域，然後編輯顯示模式是其中一個支援的模式，在該頁面上，但是不支援類別目錄的顯示模式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The SupportedDisplayModes property differs from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModes%2A> property, which references a collection containing all the display modes that are available to the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control, even those that are not supported on a particular page.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > SupportedDisplayModes 屬性不同於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModes%2A>屬性，即在參考集合，其中包含所有目前可用的顯示模式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項，即使不是支援的特定頁面。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModes%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection"></xref> that contains the set of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode"></xref> objects available on a specific Web page.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection"> </xref> ，其中包含一組<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode"></xref>特定網頁上可用的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether custom personalization state data managed by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control has changed on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出自訂個人化狀態資料是否已受<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>控制項變更網頁上。

trans-unit.source: The IPersonalizable.IsDirty property provides a way for callers to determine whether personalization state data that is managed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control has changed.
trans-unit.target: IPersonalizable.IsDirty 屬性可讓呼叫端若要判斷是否個人化狀態由管理的資料<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項已變更。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: When users personalize page-level details, for example by changing page layout, creating or deleting connections, and adding or deleting controls, the personalization data managed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control changes.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者個人化頁面層級的詳細資訊，例如藉由變更頁面配置、 建立或刪除連接，並由加入或刪除控制項，管理個人化資料<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制的變更。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: This is a pass-through method that returns to callers the value of the protected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsCustomPersonalizationStateDirty%2A> property, which cannot be directly accessed by callers.
trans-unit.target: 這是受保護的值傳回呼叫端傳遞方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsCustomPersonalizationStateDirty%2A>屬性，無法直接存取的呼叫端。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.IsCustomPersonalizationStateDirty%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The IPersonalizable.IsDirty property does not indicate whether personalizable property values, or individual properties that affect the appearance of individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, have changed.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > IPersonalizable.IsDirty 屬性不會指出是否可個人化的屬性值或個別的屬性會影響個別的外觀<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，已經變更。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Control-level personalization is tracked for each control individually.
trans-unit.target: 控制層級個人化個別追蹤每個控制項。

trans-unit.source: The IPersonalizable.IsDirty property indicates only whether personalization data that is at the page level and is managed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control has changed.
trans-unit.target: IPersonalizable.IsDirty 屬性只會指出是否個人化資料，在頁面層級且受<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項已變更。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The following list describes some common instances of personalization that would cause the IPersonalizable.IsDirty property to return a value of `true`, indicating that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control has some changed personalization data: - Closing a static <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control (or server or user control) on a page.
trans-unit.target: 下列清單將描述一些常見的執行個體的個人化，可能導致 IPersonalizable.IsDirty 屬性以傳回值為`true`，這表示，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項有某些變更個人化資料:-關閉靜態<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>頁面上，控制項 （或伺服器或使用者控制項）。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: - Restoring a closed static <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control from a page catalog back to a page.
trans-unit.target: -還原為已關閉的靜態<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>回到頁面從頁面類別目錄的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: - Moving any control within its zone or to another zone.
trans-unit.target: 移動任何控制項在其區域內，或另一個區域。

trans-unit.source: - Adding a control from a catalog of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or server controls, or adding a control programmatically.
trans-unit.target: -將控制項加入從目錄<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或伺服器控制項，或以程式設計方式加入控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: - Creating a connection between two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, either programmatically or by using the connection user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: -建立兩個連接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，以程式設計方式或使用連接的使用者介面 (UI)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: - Deleting a connection between two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, either programmatically or by using the connection UI.
trans-unit.target: -刪除兩個連接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，以程式設計方式或使用連接 UI。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: To access this property value, you must cast the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control instance to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable> interface; you can then read the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable.IsDirty%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取這個屬性值，您必須轉換<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable>介面; 您可以再讀取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable.IsDirty%2A>屬性值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable.IsDirty%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the personalization state data has changed.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，指出是否已變更個人化狀態資料。

trans-unit.source: Returns previously saved custom personalization state data that needs to be loaded to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 傳回之前儲存自訂的個人化狀態資料載入到需要<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This method is an implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable.Load%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, which provides a way for the Web Parts control set to directly access the protected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.LoadCustomPersonalizationState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable.Load%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，它提供的 Web 組件控制項設定為直接存取受保護的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.LoadCustomPersonalizationState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.LoadCustomPersonalizationState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable.Load%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, it stores the custom personalized data that is managed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control, and that was previously saved in the permanent data store for use later in the initialization process.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法時，它會儲存自訂的個人化的資料受<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項，而且先前儲存在永久的資料存放區初始化程序中稍後使用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In most cases, page and control developer code does not need to call this method, because it is primarily used by the Web Parts control set as its mechanism for retrieving personalization data.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 在大部分情況下，頁面和控制項的開發人員程式碼不必呼叫這個方法，因為主要是由 Web 組件控制項設定為擷取個人化資料的機制。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary"></xref> that contains the state data to be loaded.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary"> </xref> ，其中包含要載入的狀態資料。

trans-unit.source: Saves custom personalization state data that is managed by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 儲存自訂的個人化狀態資料受<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The IPersonalizable.Save method is an implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable.Save%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, which provides a way for the Web Parts control set to directly access the protected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SaveCustomPersonalizationState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: IPersonalizable.Save 方法是實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable.Save%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，它提供的 Web 組件控制項設定為直接存取受保護的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SaveCustomPersonalizationState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SaveCustomPersonalizationState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable.Save%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, it saves all personalized data that is managed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control to the permanent data store configured for a Web Parts application.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法時，它會將儲存所管理的所有個人化的資料<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>Web 組件的應用程式設定的永久資料儲存區的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In most cases, page and control developer code does not need to call this method, because it is primarily used by the Web Parts control set as its mechanism for saving personalization data.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 在大部分情況下，頁面和控制項的開發人員程式碼不必呼叫這個方法，因為主要是由 Web 組件控制項設定為儲存個人化資料的機制。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary"></xref> that contains the state data to be saved.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary"> </xref> ，其中包含要儲存的狀態資料。

trans-unit.source: Applies personalization state data to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control, and calls the base method to enable tracking changes to the view-state data for the control.
trans-unit.target: 適用於個人化狀態資料至<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>控制項，並呼叫基底的方法，可啟用追蹤變更控制項的檢視狀態資料。

trans-unit.source: The changes to the view-state data are stored in a <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> object, and can be accessed through the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 檢視狀態資料變更會儲存在<xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>物件，並可透過控制項的存取<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that enables child controls to be visible.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，可讓顯示的子控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to always return a value of `true` for the Visible property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>Control 覆寫基底<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性一律會傳回值為`true`的 Visible 屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Even though the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control itself is not visible, the Visible property needs to be set to `true` so that all its child controls are visible by default.
trans-unit.target: 即使<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>看不到控制項本身，Visible 屬性必須設為`true`使其所有子控制項都都預設為可見。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: If you try to set the value of the Visible property, it always generates an error because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control has overridden the base property behavior and prevents assigning any value to the property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您嘗試設定 Visible 屬性的值，則一律會產生錯誤因為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項已覆寫基底屬性行為，並防止任何值指派給屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: This property is not bindable in visual designers, but is bindable at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不是在視覺化設計工具，可繫結，但可在執行階段繫結。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.BindableAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.BindableAttribute>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.BindableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control and its child controls are visible.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，指出是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>會顯示控制項和其子控制項。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>在所有情況下。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to assign a value to the property.
trans-unit.target: 您嘗試將值指派給屬性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after a dynamic <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or other server control has been added to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> zone, to indicate that the control was added successfully.
trans-unit.target: 發生於之後動態<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>或其他伺服器控制項加入<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref>區域，表示已成功加入控制項。

trans-unit.source: The WebPartAdded event is useful for indicating that a dynamic control (a control added programmatically, as opposed to being declared in page markup) was successfully added to a zone.
trans-unit.target: WebPartAdded 事件可用於指出動態控制項 （以程式設計的方式，加入，而不是在網頁標記中所宣告的控制項） 已成功新增至區域。

trans-unit.source: In conjunction with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartAdded%2A> method, the event provides developers with a way to update the user interface (UI) or otherwise notify users that a control was successfully added.
trans-unit.target: 搭配<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartAdded%2A>方法，這個事件提供開發人員一種方式更新使用者介面 (UI) 或否則通知使用者已成功加入控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartAdded%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs during the process of adding a dynamic <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or other server control to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> zone.
trans-unit.target: 新增動態的程序期間發生<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>或其他伺服器控制項<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref>區域。

trans-unit.source: The WebPartAdding event is raised by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartAdding%2A> method after the process of adding a control to a zone has begun.
trans-unit.target: 引發 WebPartAdding 事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartAdding%2A>開始新增控制項至區域的程序之後的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartAdding%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event provides an opportunity to cancel the process before it is complete.
trans-unit.target: 此事件會提供完成之前取消此程序的機會。

trans-unit.source: If the adding process is successful, this event is followed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功加入程序，此事件後面接著<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can provide custom handlers for the event by adding the `OnWebPartAdding` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element in a page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 網頁開發人員可以提供事件的自訂處理常式加`OnWebPartAdding`屬性`<asp:webpartmanager>`項目 頁面上，指定給該屬性的自訂方法名稱。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control (or server or user control) is removed from a page.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控制項 （或伺服器或使用者控制項） 會從頁面移除。

trans-unit.source: The WebPartClosed event indicates that a control has been successfully closed, either by a user or programmatically.
trans-unit.target: WebPartClosed 事件指出，控制項已成功關閉，依使用者或以程式設計的方式。

trans-unit.source: To close a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control means to remove it from a page so that it is not rendered, and also to place it in a special holding object called a page catalog.
trans-unit.target: 若要關閉<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制是指從頁面移除，而不轉譯時，也將它放在特殊持有物件稱為頁面類別目錄。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A page catalog, which corresponds to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> control, maintains references to closed <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls for each page.
trans-unit.target: 頁面目錄中，對應至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>控制項，維護參考至已關閉<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>每一頁的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> control is declared on a page within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> zone, users can switch a page into catalog display mode, and add back to a page any controls that were previously closed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>宣告內的頁面上的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>區域，使用者可以將頁面切換至目錄的顯示模式，並將任何先前已關閉的控制項加入至頁面。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartClosed event is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartClosed%2A> method, which both raises the event and provides a handler for it.
trans-unit.target: WebPartClosed 事件是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartClosed%2A>方法，可同時引發事件並提供它的處理常式</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartClosed%2A>相關聯

trans-unit.source: Page developers can add a custom handler for the event by adding an `OnWebPartClosed` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element in a page, and then assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 網頁開發人員可以加入，將自訂事件處理常式`OnWebPartClosed`屬性`<asp:webpartmanager>`項目 頁面上，然後將自訂的方法名稱指派給屬性。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs during the process of removing a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control (or server or user control) from a page.
trans-unit.target: 移除的程序期間發生<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>從頁面控制項 （或伺服器或使用者控制項）。

trans-unit.source: The WebPartClosing event is raised by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartClosing%2A> method when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control is in the process of closing a control.
trans-unit.target: 引發 WebPartClosing 事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartClosing%2A>方法時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項正在關閉控制。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartClosing%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the removal of the control is successful, this event is followed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosed> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功移除控制項，此事件後面接著<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosed>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosed>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can provide a custom handler for the event by adding the `OnWebPartClosed` attribute to the <`asp:webpartmanager>` element in a page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 網頁開發人員可以提供自訂事件處理常式加入`OnWebPartClosed`屬性`asp:webpartmanager>`項目 頁面上，指定給該屬性的自訂方法名稱。

trans-unit.source: Normally, when the WebPartClosing event is raised as a direct result of a user closing a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, the event can be cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 一般來說，WebPartClosing 事件引發時的直接結果的使用者關閉<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，可以取消事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: However, there is a scenario in which the event cannot be cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 不過，是無法取消事件中的案例。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control is deleted, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls it contains must all be closed, otherwise they would be orphaned.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>就在刪除控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>它所包含的控制項必須全部關閉，否則它們會被遺棄。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>

trans-unit.source: In this case the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control closes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, not the user.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制關閉<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，不是使用者。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: And when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control is in the process of calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CloseWebPart%2A> method to close each control, and the WebPartClosing event is raised, the event cannot be cancelled (by design) because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> needs to complete the task of cleaning up all the zone's controls.
trans-unit.target: 與時機<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項正在呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CloseWebPart%2A>方法，關閉每個控制項，而且 WebPartClosing 事件引發時，事件無法取消 （符合設計），因為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>必須完成清除所有區域控制項的工作。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CloseWebPart%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or other server control has been deleted from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> zone.
trans-unit.target: 之後，就會發生<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>或其他伺服器控制項從中<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref>區域。

trans-unit.source: The WebPartDeleted event is useful for indicating that a dynamic control (a control added programmatically, as opposed to being declared in page markup) was successfully deleted from a zone.
trans-unit.target: WebPartDeleted 事件可用於指出動態控制項 （以程式設計的方式，加入，而不是在網頁標記中所宣告的控制項） 已成功刪除從區域。

trans-unit.source: In conjunction with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartDeleted%2A> method, the event provides developers with a way to update the user interface (UI) or otherwise notify users that a control was successfully deleted.
trans-unit.target: 搭配<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartDeleted%2A>方法，這個事件會提供一種方式，來更新使用者介面 (UI) 或否則通知使用者已成功刪除控制項的開發人員。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartDeleted%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs during the process of permanently deleting an instance of a dynamic <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or other server control from a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> zone.
trans-unit.target: 永久刪除的動態執行個體的程序期間發生<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>或從其他伺服器控制項<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref>區域。

trans-unit.source: The WebPartDeleting event is raised by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartDeleting%2A> method, during the process of deleting a dynamic control (one that has been added programmatically or by a user through the Web Parts user interface).
trans-unit.target: 引發 WebPartDeleting 事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartDeleting%2A>方法，刪除動態控制項 （一個以程式設計方式或透過 Web 組件的使用者介面的使用者已加入） 的過程。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartDeleting%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event provides an opportunity to cancel the process before it is finished.
trans-unit.target: 事件會提供完成之前取消此程序的機會。

trans-unit.source: If the deletion process is successfully completed, this event is followed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleted> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果順利完成刪除程序，此事件後面接著<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleted>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleted>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can provide custom handlers for the event by adding the `OnWebPartDeleting` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element in a page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 網頁開發人員可以提供事件的自訂處理常式加`OnWebPartDeleting`屬性`<asp:webpartmanager>`項目 頁面上，指定給該屬性的自訂方法名稱。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or server control has been moved to a different location on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 之後，就會發生<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>或網頁伺服器控制項移至不同的位置。

trans-unit.source: This event applies to both static (declared in the markup of a Web page) and dynamic controls.
trans-unit.target: （在網頁標記中宣告） 的靜態和動態控制項適用於此事件。

trans-unit.source: It is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartMoved%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartMoved%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartMoved%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because the event is raised after a move is complete, developers can include an event handler to provide some notification to users, some validation, or some other actions.
trans-unit.target: 移動完成之後，就會引發事件，因為開發人員可以包含提供給使用者、 驗證或執行其他動作的相關通知的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: To add an event handler, you can add an `OnWebPartMoved` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element in a page, and assign the name of a custom method to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入事件處理常式，您可以加入`OnWebPartMoved`屬性`<asp:webpartmanager>`元素在頁面上，並指派給屬性的自訂方法的名稱。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs during the process of moving a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or other server control that is contained in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> zone.
trans-unit.target: 移動的程序期間發生<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>或包含在其他伺服器控制項<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref>區域。

trans-unit.source: The WebPartMoving event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server control is being moved within its own zone, or to another zone.
trans-unit.target: WebPartMoving 引發時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或它自己的區域內，或另一個區域，移動其他伺服器控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: This can occur both when a user drags a control, and when there is a programmatic move.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者拖曳控制項，及以程式設計方式移動時，也可能會發生。

trans-unit.source: The WebPartMoving event is raised by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartMoving%2A> method, and it provides an opportunity to cancel the moving process before it is complete.
trans-unit.target: 引發 WebPartMoving 事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartMoving%2A>方法，這個方法，並提供完成之前取消移動程序的機會。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartMoving%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the move is completed and the control placed in a new position, this event is followed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果已完成的移動，並放在新位置的控制項，此事件後面是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can create a custom handler for the event by adding the `OnWebPartMoving` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 網頁開發人員可以建立自訂事件處理常式加入`OnWebPartMoving`屬性`<asp:webpartmanager>`項目，並將自訂的方法名稱指派給屬性。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to all <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls tracked by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 取得所有參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控制項所追蹤<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>網頁上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The WebParts property is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control to track all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls that are contained within <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones on the page.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件屬性供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項以追蹤所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>內所包含的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>網頁的區域。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Although the collection is read-only, you can access individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls through the collection and make changes to them programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 集合是唯讀的雖然您可以存取個別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>以程式設計方式控制這些集合並變更透過。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > It is possible to have a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control placed on a page outside of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> zone, which results in the control not being tracked by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control or referenced in its WebParts collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 很可能有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>之外的頁面上的控制項置於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>區域使用，這會導致控制項沒有追蹤<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制或其 web 組件集合中所參考。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: However, there is little reason to use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control outside of a zone, because it then loses its Web Parts functionality and acts as a normal server control.
trans-unit.target: 不過，沒有什麼道理使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項區域外,，因為它然後失去其 Web 組件的功能，並做為一般的伺服器控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Any type of control that can be placed in a zone, whether a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, a standard ASP.NET control, a user control, or a custom server control, can be treated as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control at run time.
trans-unit.target: 任何類型的控制項，可放置在區域中，是否自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項、 標準的 ASP.NET 控制項、 使用者控制項或自訂伺服器控制項，可用來當做<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項在執行階段。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: When a control that is not a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is placed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> zone, at run time ASP.NET wraps the control with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> object, so that the control can behave as a true <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項時，不是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項放入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>區域，在 ASP.NET 包裝的控制項的執行階段<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>物件，使控制項可以如同真正<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, by using the WebParts property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control can track any type of server control, regardless of whether it derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class.
trans-unit.target: 因此，使用 web 組件屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制可以追蹤任何類型的伺服器控制項，不論是否衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection"></xref> that contains references to a set of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection"> </xref> ，其中包含一組參考<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after a specific connection has been established between <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls (or server or user controls).
trans-unit.target: 之間建立特定的連接之後，就會發生<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控制項 （或伺服器或使用者控制項）。

trans-unit.source: The WebPartsConnected event is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnected%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: WebPartsConnected 事件相關聯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnected%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnected%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event is useful because after you know that a connection is complete, you might want to inform the user of the fact, or even change the user interface (UI) of the page.
trans-unit.target: 此事件很有用，因為您知道連接完成之後，您可能想要通知使用者的事實，或甚至變更頁面的使用者介面 (UI)。

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to display some graphic image that suggests a successful connection between two controls, or display a brief message, and then change the page display mode back to browse mode.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可能想要顯示特定圖形影像，表示成功連接兩個控制項，或顯示簡短訊息，然後將頁面顯示模式變更回瀏覽模式。

trans-unit.source: Page developers can associate a custom event handler with this event by adding the `OnWebPartsConnected` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element in the page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 網頁開發人員可以關聯的自訂事件處理常式與此事件加入`OnWebPartsConnected`屬性`<asp:webpartmanager>`項目頁面上，指定給該屬性的自訂方法名稱。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
